StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Leveraging Extended Families for Cardiovascular Disease Genomic Discovery

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF UTAHVA SALT LAKE CITY HEALTHCARE SYSTEM

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This work was supported by grant X01HL133652 to M. Tristani-Firouzi from the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute (NHLBI), a part of the National Institutes of Health (NIH). For publications, written, and/or oral presentations resulting from use of this data, please cite the following information: “The original data description for Leveraging Extended Families for Cardiovascular Disease Genomic Discovery can be found here: (Journal Citation Nature Communications) (PMID __Pending__). The original data used for the analysis in this publication can be found in the NIH database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) under the accession number phs______.”
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Only full or expedited approvals are acceptable, and an ANNUAL IRB review is required based on the informed consents from the data submitting institution.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)
